breadcrumbs.title: Amend or refund a driving charge

texts: Be careful not to mix up the letters 'I ' and 'O ' with the numbers '1 ' and '0 '.
Choose the country of registration carefully. If you pick the wrong one you risk getting a penalty.
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"What if my vehicle details are incorrect?"}
If the number plate (Vehicle Registration Mark) is correct but the description shown is wrong, you can still continue.
Vehicle information is provided to TfL by the DVLA so you'll need to let the DVLA know if your details are wrong or need to be updated.
Be careful not to mix up the letters 'I ' and 'O ' with the numbers '1 ' and '0 '.
Choose the country of registration carefully. If you pick the wrong one you risk getting a penalty.
UK-registered: If your vehicle's make and model details have not been returned, make sure you entered the number plate correctly before continuing.
Registered outside the United Kingdom: We are unable to display the make, model and colour information. Confirm this is the correct vehicle to continue.
Based on the vehicle details entered and information held by the DVLA and TfL today, this vehicle is exempt from the Congestion Charge.
If you believe this is incorrect, you can still continue to pay charges to drive in London.
This may change - always check to see if you need to pay to drive within the zone.
This vehicle is currently registered for a Congestion Charge 100% discount.
This vehicle does not have the 100% Congestion Charge discount of the original vehicle - it can't be used for an amend on this charge. Try a different vehicle if you can.
It either meets the LEZ emissions standards, has a 100% discount or there is no LEZ charge due.
It either meets the ULEZ emissions standards or there is no ULEZ charge due.
Based on the vehicle details entered and information held by the DVLA and TfL today, this vehicle is exempt from the ULEZ charge. If you believe this is incorrect you can still continue.
This may change - always check to see if you need to pay to drive within the zone.
It is currently classified as having no ULEZ charge due.
This vehicle is currently registered for a ULEZ 100% discount.
This vehicle does not have the 100% ULEZ discount of the original vehicle. You can't use it for an amend on this charge. Try a different vehicle if you can.
